alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:17PM CST until December 15 at 10:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Taylor County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 917 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cornell to 6 miles south of Loyal, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rib Lake around 955 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wood Lake, Polley, The Mondeaux Flowage, Highway 13 And County Road M, Stetsonville, Perkinstown and County Roads A And E. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and north central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
